sorular.soru: Your car and trailer together are 8 metres long. In which situation are you allowed to keep driving like this?

feedback.metin: In the upper right and bottom right situations, you drive in the right position. In the upper left situation, you drive in the leftmost lane of the three. If your combination car including trailer is longer than 7 metres, you may only use the two rightmost lanes. In the situation below left, you do not keep enough to the right. You have to use the rush-hour lane here.
